html: This bipartisan disaster relief package is a win for our farmers, it's a win for families and businesses who were devastated by historic hurricanes in the Southeast and wildfires in the West, and it's a win for the people in Puerto Rico who the President has previously helped.
text: This bipartisan disaster relief package is a win for our farmers, it's a win for families and businesses who were devastated by historic hurricanes in the Southeast and wildfires in the West, and it's a win for the people in Puerto Rico who the President has previously helped.

html: Some senators argue we should allocate more funding for Puerto Rico. I would remind them this is the same level of funding they have previously supported.
text:
Some senators argue we should allocate more funding for Puerto Rico.
 
I would remind them this is the same level of funding they have previously supported.

html: To ensure Puerto Rico continues to have the resources it needs to recover from Hurricane Maria and Hurricane Irma, our disaster relief bill includes $600 million in additional nutrition assistance for the most vulnerable families in Puerto Rico.
text: To ensure Puerto Rico continues to have the resources it needs to recover from Hurricane Maria and Hurricane Irma, our disaster relief bill includes $600 million in additional nutrition assistance for the most vulnerable families in Puerto Rico.

html: Our bill includes $3 billion for agriculture disaster relief and additional funds for Georgia and other states like Florida, Alabama, the Carolinas, Alaska, Hawaii, California, Iowa, Nebraska, Missouri, and Kansas that have battled natural disasters over the last year.

html: Every night, farmers in Georgia get on their knees and pray help will soon come. They pray their lenders will show compassion. They pray they won’t go bankrupt. They pray they will be able to provide for their families.
text:
Every night, farmers in Georgia get on their knees and pray help will soon come. 

They pray their lenders will show compassion.

They pray they won’t go bankrupt.

They pray they will be able to provide for their families.

text: After 8 months of work, there is no excuse for settling for the status quo. @SenJoniErnst, @SenatorLankford & I are committed to continuing our efforts next year to responsibly fix the federal government’s funding process.

html: This should have been commonsense, but yet again political self-interest stood in the way of significant results.
text: This should have been commonsense, but yet again political self-interest stood in the way of significant results.

html: .@SenJoniErnst, @SenatorLankford & I offered amendments to end Washington’s addiction to continuing resolutions & to hold members of Congress accountable for finishing the budget job on time.
text: .@SenJoniErnst, @SenatorLankford & I offered amendments to end Washington’s addiction to continuing resolutions & to hold members of Congress accountable for finishing the budget job on time.

html: Most of these ideas were met with little disagreement in conversation but suddenly received major pushback when it was time to put the ideas into action.

text:
As Hurricane #Michael nears land, take shelter & stay safe.

html: The U.S. Senate just passed long overdue regulatory relief for community & regional banks. These small banks have been hammered by one-size-fits-all government regulations since Dodd-Frank was enacted 8 years ago, & $2 TRILLION is not at work in our economy as a result.
text: The U.S. Senate just passed long overdue regulatory relief for community & regional banks. These small banks have been hammered by one-size-fits-all government regulations since Dodd-Frank was enacted 8 years ago, & $2 TRILLION is not at work in our economy as a result.

html: The U.S. Senate will vote soon on a major bipartisan bill to roll back stifling Dodd-Frank regulations and provide relief to regional and community banks across the country, including @FlintBank in Albany. Read more from their CEO: https://www.perdue.senate.gov/news/scott-tomlinson-regulatory-relief-legislation-good-for-communities … #Relief4MainStreet
